## What is the Data Science Lab?

- [hutchdatascience.org](https://hutchdatascience.org)
- Outreach and Learning Arm of the Office of the Chief Data Officer
- Dedicated to helping people get better at working with Data
- Not just for Data Scientists!
- Psychologically Safe Space to ask questions and learn

## Who Can Take Our Courses?

- Anyone in the Fred Hutch Consortium!
